accounts.name: polymarket_marker
docs: Polymarket ID marker - prevents duplicate markets
If this account already exists, the transaction will fail
Uses first 32 bytes of polymarket_id as seed (condition IDs are typically shorter)

instructions.name: fill_order
docs: Fill an order against the AMM (keeper instruction)

accounts.name: filler
docs: Keeper or authority that can fill orders

accounts.name: user
docs: User whose order is being filled

instructions.name: settle_funding
docs: Settle funding for a user's position

instructions.name: settle_market
docs: Settle a market after the event resolves (admin/keeper instruction)

instructions.name: settle_position
docs: Settle a user's position in a settled market

accounts.name: authority
docs: User or authority settling the position

instructions.name: update_funding
docs: Update funding rate for a market (keeper instruction)

instructions.name: update_oracle
docs: Update oracle price for a market (keeper instruction)

instructions.name: withdraw
docs: Withdraw SOL collateral with margin safety check
Users can only withdraw collateral that isn't being used as margin

errors.name: DuplicateMarket
errors.msg: Market with this Polymarket ID already exists

errors.name: ReduceOnlyOrderIncreasesPosition
errors.msg: Reduce only order would increase position

errors.name: TradeSizeTooLarge
errors.msg: Trade size too large for AMM

types.name: AMM
docs: Uses zero_copy for efficient on-chain access

fields.name: peg_multiplier
docs: Peg multiplier - scales reserves to real price

fields.name: min_base_asset_reserve
docs: Minimum base reserves (limits how high price can go)

fields.name: max_base_asset_reserve
docs: Maximum base reserves (limits how low price can go)

fields.name: terminal_quote_asset_reserve
docs: Terminal quote reserves when AMM position is 0

fields.name: base_asset_amount_with_amm
docs: Net position: positive = AMM is short (users net long)

fields.name: base_asset_amount_short
docs: Total short open interest (stored as positive)

fields.name: last_mark_price_twap
docs: Last computed mark price TWAP (1 hour)

fields.name: last_mark_price_twap_5min
docs: Last computed mark price TWAP (5 min)

types.name: Order
docs: An order placed by a user

fields.name: market_index
docs: Market index this order is for

fields.name: price
docs: Limit price for limit orders (0 for market orders)

fields.name: base_asset_amount
docs: Total base asset amount for this order

fields.name: base_asset_amount_filled
docs: Amount that has been filled so far

fields.name: reduce_only
docs: If true, order can only reduce position

fields.name: post_only
docs: If true, order can only add to the book (no immediate fill)

fields.name: max_ts
docs: Maximum timestamp for order validity (0 = no expiry)

types.name: PerpPosition
docs: Perpetual position for a specific market

fields.name: market_index
docs: Market index this position is for

fields.name: quote_entry_amount
docs: Quote amount at entry (for unrealized P&L)

fields.name: last_cumulative_funding_rate
docs: Last cumulative funding rate when position was updated

fields.name: open_bids
docs: Open bid exposure (from open long orders)

fields.name: open_asks
docs: Open ask exposure (from open short orders)

fields.name: open_orders
docs: Number of open orders for this market

types.name: PositionDirection
docs: Direction of a position or order

fields.name: polymarket_id
docs: Polymarket condition ID for oracle reference

fields.name: oracle
docs: Oracle account that provides price data

fields.name: settlement_price
docs: Final settlement price (0 or 1_000_000 for NO/YES)

fields.name: funding_period
docs: Funding period in seconds (e.g., 3600 for 1 hour)

fields.name: admin
docs: Admin authority who can update protocol settings

fields.name: collateral_vault
docs: Collateral vault holding all user deposits

fields.name: collateral_vault_bump
docs: Bump seed for the collateral vault PDA

fields.name: exchange_paused
docs: Whether the entire exchange is paused

fields.name: liquidation_margin_ratio
docs: Default liquidation margin ratio (for new markets)

types.name: User
docs: User account holding collateral, positions, and orders

fields.name: authority
docs: The wallet that owns this account

fields.name: delegate
docs: Optional delegate who can trade on behalf of user

fields.name: collateral
docs: Total collateral deposited (native SOL in lamports)
